articles.description:
RTâ€‚Charles Edwards
What is the most similar asset to Bitcoin? Gold.
What happened when the Gold ETF launched?
In November 2004, Gold was in a bear market, down -50% (much like Bitcoin is today). When the ETF approval hit, what followed was a massive +350% return, seven-year bull-run. 
Food forâ€¦
